Perceptor/Aelo/Celeno/Ocipite/Dragonfly/7 bat 
Probes/Deepfear/Charon/Underground/Wespah/Manthys::


Manthys shot to Nighteyes's back (25 shots).

Darkfate's Bat-probes started to shot against Megatron, while 
Perceptor appeared and did the same (25 shot x bot)

Dragonfly shots against Tankkor while he was flying in robot mode (10 
shot) then Charon arrived and join to Dragonfly and shot against 
Tankkor too.

Wespah, Aelo, Celeno, Ocipite, Underground and Deepfear arrived and 
shot 25 blasts by bot against Aerostreak's, Aktron's Putnam's 
Odiphiuos's and Venus's back.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Killfest/EndBringer/Greven/Scyther/Demise/Goldeneye::
> 
> Killfest turns, several of Megatron's shots hitting him before he 
> jumps forward, and ducks, more shots sailing overhead. He grouns, 
> tossing a charge at Megatron.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> EndBringer laughs, feeling the heat but paying little attention to 
> it. He turns, his tentacles raising Tankorr in the way of Marine's 
> missiles. EndBringer increases the voltage his tentacles were 
putting 
> through Tankorr.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Greven growls as a bot lands on his back. He reaches behind him, 
> trying to grab Aerostreak and toss him off. He swings at Terrorsaur 
> with his other hand as he approaches the bot.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Scyther slies upward, a lasso passing underneath him. Two energon 
> shots hit Darkmouse, but he keeps safe. Scyther flies further 
upward.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Demise ripps another tree out of his way. He was close now.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Goldneye falls toward the ground, thrown around a bit by the wing 
> Megaton had created earlier.
> 
>
